summary.title: ShareNote
summary.description:
The system under study is a web-based collaborative note-taking app, called ShareNote. The app allows users to
create notes, and share them so others can either read or edit notes, depending on permissions set by the creator
of the note. Users can also comment on notes.

data.name: end-user
data.description: A user can create a note that can be shared with other users.

threats.title: Credential too weak or stolen
threats.description: Credentials of user can be stolen or guessed.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Repudiation of creating note
threats.description: A end-user could create notes impersonating another user.
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A
